localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Sell access to a google sheet without sharing with the whole INTERNET. Easy to set up via Gumroad. Using gumroad ping, this sheet's script captures all sales and matches the sale with a sheet you assign in. Then gives viewer access to the buyer.
blogPost.body: Sell access to a google sheet without sharing with the whole INTERNET. Easy to set up via Gumroad. Using gumroad ping, this sheet's script captures all sales and matches the sale with a sheet you assign in. Then gives viewer access to the buyer.
blogPost.title: OnlySheets - Sell access to any Google Sheet
blogPost.author: Andrew Kamphey

localize.description: 出售访问google表，而不与整个INTERNET共享。通过Gumroad轻松设置。使用gumroad ping，这个表的脚本捕获所有的销售和匹配销售与你分配的表在。然后给浏览者访问买家。
localize.tagline: 出售任何Google Sheet的访问权限

localize.description: 出售訪問google表，而不與整個INTERNET共享。通過Gumroad輕鬆設置。使用gumroad ping，這個表的腳本捕獲所有的銷售和匹配銷售與你分配的表在。然後給瀏覽者訪問買家。
localize.tagline: 出售任何Google Sheet的訪問權限

previous.excerpt: Ready-to-use templates to prepare each email faster. Inform your subscribers about something very cool in a modern way. Don't waste time changing a single email design. Focus on the content.
previous.title: Letterbox - Clean HTML email templates for creating stylish newsletters

localize.description: 现成的模板可以更快地准备每封邮件。以现代的方式告知您的订阅者一些非常酷的东西。不要浪费时间改变单一的电子邮件设计。专注于内容。
localize.tagline: 清晰的HTML电子邮件模板，用于创建时尚的新闻邮件。

localize.description: 現成的模板可以更快地準備每封郵件。以現代的方式告知您的訂閱者一些非常酷的東西。不要浪費時間改變單一的電子郵件設計。專注於內容。
localize.tagline: 清晰的HTML電子郵件模板，用於創建時尚的新聞郵件。

next.excerpt: This cloud-based tool will help you analyze your Facebook profile by providing detailed info on who is engaging with your posts! Find who is inactive and delete them with a few clicks. Easily automate friend's request process.
next.title: Friend Filter Pro - Remove inactive Facebook friends & know who unfollowed you

localize.description: 这个基于云计算的工具将帮助你分析你的Facebook资料，提供关于谁在参与你的帖子的详细信息! 找到谁是不活跃的，并删除他们只需点击几下。轻松地自动处理朋友的请求过程。
localize.tagline: 删除不活跃的Facebook好友，知道谁取消了对你的关注。

localize.description: 這個基於雲計算的工具將幫助你分析你的Facebook資料，提供關於誰在參與你的帖子的詳細信息! 找到誰是不活躍的，並刪除他們只需點擊幾下。輕鬆地自動處理朋友的請求過程。
localize.tagline: 刪除不活躍的Facebook好友，知道誰取消了對你的關注。
